verses.content: Chun, Sahrâng ki sâwm le lu sari nei, tuisuorieta hung suok ka hmuh a, a kihaia chun lallukhum sâwm a uma, a luhaia chun Pathien hrilsietna hminghai a um bawk a.

Chun, ka Sahrâng hmu chu keitê ang a na, a kehai chu savawm ke ang a nih; a bau chu sakeibaknei bau ang a nih; chun, drakon chun a kuomah a thilthawtheina le a lalṭhungpha le thuneina nasatak a pêk a.
A lu pakhat chu thipui khawp raua hliem angin ka hmuh a, nisien- lakhawm, thipui khawp rau dinga hliem chu a dam tah a; chuongchun, hnuoia mi po poin Sahrâng chu mak an tih a, an zui a.
Chun, Sahrâng kuoma chun a thuneina chu a pêk leiin drakon chu Pathien chibai bûkin an bûk a; chun, “Sahrâng ang hi tu am a uma, tuin am do thei a ta?” tiin Sahrâng khawm chu an bûk bawk a.
Chun, uongna le Pathien hril- sietna thu hrilna bau a kuoma pêk a na, thla sâwmli pahni châng dingin thuneina pêk a ni bawk a.
Chuongchun, Pathien hrilsein a bau a ka tah a, a hming le a umna, vâna umhai chu hrilse dingin.
Chun, mi inthienghai a do le a hne phal a na, chi tinrêng dâm, mi tinrêng dâm, ṭawng tinrêng dâm, hnam tinrêng dâm chunga thuneina a kuoma pêk a ni bawk a.
Chuongchun, hnuoia um po po, leilung insieng tîra that tah Berâmtê Hringna Bua hming ziek naw po chun, Pathien chibai bûkin bûk an tih.
Tûkhawmin na a nei chun hre raw se.
Tûkhawm sala um ding ani chun salah a um hlak, tûkhawmin kâwlhnâma mi a that chun kâwl- hnâma that ding a nih. Hitaka hin mi inthienghai selna le ringna inlang theina a um.
Chun, Sahrâng dang hnuoia hung suok ka hmuh a; berâmte kî ang ki pahni a nei a, drakon ṭawng angin a ṭawng a.
Sahrâng hmasa thuneina po po ang kha a mithmuah a hmang a, Hnuoi le a chunga um po pohai chu Sahrâng hmasa lem, thipui khawp rau dinga hliem dam nâwk chu, chibai ân bûktir bawk a.
Chun, mihriem mithmuah vâna inthawka hnuoia mei intlâktir thei khawp rauin thilmak ropuitak a thaw hlak.

Hnuoia umhai kuomah, Sa- hrâng kâwlhnâma hliem hnung la dam chawimawina dingin ama lim an siem ding a ni ti hrilin, Sahrâng mithmua thilmak thaw dinga thu a ihmu, chuong thilmak lei chun hnuoia umhai chu a hlêm bawk a.
Chun, Sahrâng lim chu a ṭawng theina ding le, Sahrâng lim chibai bûk naw taphawt ân sukhlumtir theina dingin Sahrâng lim kuoma chun inthuokna pêk phal a nih.
Chun, mi po po a lien a chînin, a hausa a pasiein, suok le suok nawhai khawm, an kut chang tienga manih, an chala manih inchikna ân neitir tâwl a;
inchikna, Sahrâng hming ama- nih, a hming nambar amanih, neihai chau naw chun, tûkhawmin ieng- khawm an inchâwkin an zawr thei nawna dingin.
Hitaka hin varna inlang theina a um. Hriet theina nei chun Sahrâng nambar chu sût raw se; mihriem nambar a ni sih a; a nambar chu za ruk sâwmruk paruk a nih.
